items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Fit
items.body: I weigh 150 lbs and am 5â€™7 and ordered a medium. I just lost 150 lbs and wanted to show off my weight loss without being too much and this dress was perfect. It was not super tight but stretchy and comfortable. The style was perfect and fits perfectly. The dress was not too heavy but not thin. The fabric is soft on the skin and not scratchy. Read more
items.author: Laura Stansell

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A must buy
items.body: Amazing quality with a very flattering fit. Super versatile pairs well with heels, boots, or flats and transitions easily from casual to dressed up. Compliments guaranteed! Read more

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Satisfied

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not my fav fit
items.body: It did the job for the event I had, but I wasn't in love with the fit. I am 5'1 and usually an XS. Length was great, but the fit around the bust and waist was oversized. Comfortable and kept me warm, but wouldnt recommend to anyone who is petite frame. On trend dress, great for winter! Read more

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Used dress with makeup stains
items.body: I was sent a used dress. It had a scent on it, makeup on the neck area and lint on the fabric. I am disappointed because this dress was $40 and I was sent a used dress. Read more
items.author: Arleen Brown

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Runs very big on waist/ hip. Double size down
items.body: Good quality dress, but way too big. Could be cute if it had a better shape to the hip area. Heavier comfortable material and color is just like pink in picture, very cute color. I sized down per the reviews and it was still way too big. Iâ€™m 5â€™3 122lbs and I usually order mediums it most dresses on Amazon but reviews said this runs big. I got a small and itâ€™s still wayyy too big and baggy around stomach/ low back so itâ€™s not a flattering tight fit anywhere. I rly wanted this to work for my sisters baby shower so I might try again with an XS but worried that still Might not fit right. Lenght was fine itâ€™s meant to be long almost to my ankles Read more
items.author: Kassidy

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Long Sleeve Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Long Sleeve Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Sky Blue, Brown, Pink, White, Beige, Army Green, Dark Blue, Black, Caramel, Navy Blue, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs.
